nodes.text: The SLOT TOKEN press sits bolted to the laminate, its handle polished by nervous hands. The die face is clean, the warning plate sharper than the counter: AUTHORIZED IMPRESSIONS ONLY.

It stamps custody onto a token. (pause) That token’s what you show at checkpoints. (pause) You’re carrying the slot. (pause) Lose it and it’s abandonment. (pause) Abandoned assets get recovered. (pause) Sometimes you. (pause) Usually someone quicker.
